pkgmetadata.longdescription: MCMC Sampling from 'TMB' Model Object using 'Stan' // Enables all 'rstan' functionality for a 'TMB' model object, in particular MCMC sampling and chain visualization. Sampling can be performed with or without Laplace approximation for the random effects. This is demonstrated in Monnahan Kristensen (2018) DOI:10.1371/journal.pone.0197954.
